message: Let's be fair and divide it 60-40. We both get a good amount, and we avoid losing value due to inflation.
Your 60/40 split seems unfair considering the inflation rate hurts me more. I'm proposing a 52/48 split in your favor.  This ensures we both benefit from an early agreement.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. I'm willing to make a small concession. 58-42 is a more than fair split, given the circumstances.

Alice, we need to find a compromise. This offer is a gesture of good faith to reach an agreement. I'm losing more each round, but I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle if you're serious about ending this quickly.
